span.font: Humana is seeking a Technology Application Architect for its Louisville, KY location. You will develop a comprehensive understanding of Humana’s business needs and strategic goals and translate those demands into system architecture and design specifications. You will examine existing technology, interface with internal customers and external vendors, and continually develop technical improvements.

span.style: mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.style: COLOR: #333333; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.style: mso-fareast-font-family: "Times New Roman"; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.span: Partner with Humana’s internal Applications and Architecture teams to develop an understanding of current implementations of web and mobile application standards, map existing applications to data sources, and identify and help resolve problematic application issues.

li.style: COLOR: #333333; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.style: mso-fareast-font-family: "Times New Roman"; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.span: Map requirements of partner Architecture, define technical solutions based on those requirements, and create and document a migration path for existing applications as they transition to a reference Architecture implementation.

li.style: COLOR: #333333; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.style: mso-fareast-font-family: "Times New Roman"; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.span: Create and manage a technical Digital Architecture future state vision and IT backlog to reflect it.

li.style: COLOR: #333333; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.style: mso-fareast-font-family: "Times New Roman"; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.span: Assist in the creation of IT Product Roadmaps, IT Product Backlogs as well as partner with business and IT stakeholders to develop supporting artifacts and constructing abstraction models.

li.style: COLOR: #333333; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.style: mso-fareast-font-family: "Times New Roman"; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri

li.span: Create design models for web, mobile and data services and presentation components.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Technically lead multiple digital agile teams as well as contribute to the development efforts as an enabling member of the team.

span.font: Must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field, plus 5 years of progressively responsible, post-bachelor’s related experience, or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related technical field plus 3 years of related experience. Required experience must include 5 years (or 3 years) with a Master’s degree in the following skills:

span.font: Send detailed technical resume to Humana, Attn: Amanda Millay, Talent Acquisition Specialist, 500 West Main Street, Louisville, KY 40202, or apply online at www.humana.com/careers (Ref. # 182401

div.span: Humana Inc., headquartered in Louisville, Ky., is a leading health care company that offers a wide range of insurance products and health and wellness services that incorporate an integrated approach to lifelong well-being. By leveraging the strengths of its core businesses, Humana believes it can better explore opportunities for existing and emerging adjacencies in health care that can further enhance wellness opportunities for the millions of people across the nation with whom the company has relationships.
